'''1.20 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.20-rc1''' in the launcher) is the first and only release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.20]], released on May 31, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-20-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.20 Release Candidate 1|May 31, 2023}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Splash]]es'''
* Added "Joule is neat too!"

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Chiseled bookshelf]]'''
* [[Knowledge book]]s can now be placed inside them.

=== General ===
'''[[Tag]]'''
* Added {{cd|knowledge_book}} into the {{cd|#bookshelf_books}} item tag.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.20 Release Candidate 1
|;old
|256477|Knowledge books can't be placed in chiseled bookshelves.
|262325|Ice/Slime blocks don't give speed when landing towards the very edge of the block.
|;dev
|262853|Pitcher plant breaks and floats when growing without enough light.
}}</onlyinclude>
